name: Hidden Syndicates
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

sections.label: Replace Heavy Throwing Weapon and Hand Weapon

options.label: Heavy Throwing Weapon (12", A1, AP(1)), Dagger (A2)

sections.label: Replace Throwing Weapon and Hand Weapon

spells.name: Acrobatic Defense
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Counter-Attack once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Mirror-Blade
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 6", which takes 1 hit with AP(2) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Shadow Mist
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Gloom-Mist Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Shatter-Darts
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(1) and Fragment each.

spells.name: Fatal Assault
spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Slayer against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (this._skirmish ? 1 : this.AuraSize), avgUnit: true }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Sorrow-Globe
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 18", which take 2 hits each.

specialRules.name: Deathstrike
specialRules.description: If this model is killed in melee, the attacking unit takes X hits.

specialRules.name: Teleport
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, place this model anywhere fully within 6" of its position.

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Melee Shrouding. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Unpredictable Fighter
specialRules.description: When in melee, roll one die and apply one effect to all models with this rule: on a 1-3 they get AP(+1), and on a 4-6 they get +1 to hit rolls instead.

specialRules.name: Takedown Strike
specialRules.description: Once per game, when it's this model's turn to attack in melee, you may pick one model in the unit as its target, and make one attack at Quality 2+ with AP(2) and Deadly(3), which is resolved as if it's a unit of 1.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Grounded Stealth
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule has most of them within 1" of terrain, enemies get -1 to hit rolls when attacking them.

specialRules.name: Gloom-Mist
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Gloom-Mist Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Gloom-Mist Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Rending when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Rending when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Teleport Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Teleport. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Slayer Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Slayer against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Versatile Attack Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Versatile Attack. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fragment
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and against units where most models have Defense 2+ to Defense 4+, this weapon gets AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding
specialRules.description: Enemies get -3" movement when trying to charge units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Deadly
specialRules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds dont carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Gloom-Mist Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Gloom-Mist, enemies attacking them always get -1 to hit rolls from Gloom-Mist (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Rending
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and on unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+4).

specialRules.name: Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Versatile Attack
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick one effect: until the end of the activation all models with this rule in it either get AP(+1) when attacking, or get +1 to hit rolls when attacking.

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Counter-Attack
specialRules.description: Strikes first when charged.
